date

2008-12-27

note/2008

The snow is finally melting away from the sidewalks in Seattle, which means I can emerge blinking into the daylight. The site updates are coming ever so slowly.

I finally updated post/2001/Python Babysteps Tutorial  to cover Python 2.6. A quick blurb was added to go over installing ActivePython on Linux, since that’s what I just did this afternoon while double-checking the code and IDLE options.
